messages.text:
We have everything ready to start room reservations for Moonfest 2026. ‚ú®

üëã Official Date Change üëã

For hotel logistics reasons, the event dates have been adjusted. Please save the official date:

From July 10 to July 13, 2026. üóìÔ∏è

Stage 1: Room Reservations

Now that the date is confirmed and the link is enabled, we are entering the first stage of our schedule.

It is mandatory to reserve your room in order to attend the event. ‚ö†Ô∏è

On the website you will find an FAQ section with essential information to answer your questions.

üëá Make your reservation here! üëá

https://moonfest-b63fa.web.app/

‚ö†Ô∏è Important note: The website is still under development. Since you are the first wave using it, you may see changes or adjustments in the future. Thank you for being part of this process!

We are so back üòé

We are here to let you know the issue with the hotel has been resolved and we can continue with this very important phase.

On Sunday, January 11, 2026 at 2:00 PM (GMT-5), we will publish the link to proceed with room reservations. Remember we have rooms for up to 4 people and some for 2 people.

Remember it is important to have or be part of a room in order to attend the event, and ticket payment will be made through a separate announcement.

Emergency announcement üò∞

We need to inform you that we must postpone publishing the link.

During our verification tests before publication, we noticed the hotel's link stopped working correctly, so we will need to wait for the hotel to respond about what happened. üî•

As soon as we have a response and a solution to this issue, we will let you know.

We are sorry for the inconvenience üòü

üëã Welcome to Moonfest ‚ú®

Let me introduce myself, I am Jecht Howl and I will be your host during the event. It is a pleasure to have you here.

I am here to tell you that today, Friday, January 9, 2026, at 8:00 PM (GMT-5), you will be able to start reserving your rooms. We currently have 60 rooms available for up to 4 people (not restrictive), meaning if you want a room for yourself or your partner, you can also reserve.

You can also find more information and answers to frequently asked questions on our website.

So I will see you at 8:00 to take your reservations, and please keep order in the queue.

Remember this is only for room reservations; event entry will be handled through another link.

#FursuitFriday #Moonfest2026 #FurryColombia

Hello everyone,

We know we already made one date-change announcement, and unfortunately we have to make another. The hotel informed us that the July 24-27 dates are not available either. We deeply regret these inconveniences, which were entirely caused by the hotel's internal organization issues.

The final dates for Moonfest 2026 are July 10-13, 2026.

The great news is that, after all these issues, we finally have the room reservation link ready!

As promised, people who attended the Furry Colombia Halloween party will have a small advantage over everyone else. We will release the link to them 24 hours earlier so they can make their reservation.

We wish you happy holidays and greatly appreciate your patience and understanding. Sorry for all the delays caused by this situation, and thank you for staying with us.

If you have any questions, we are at your disposal.

Moonfest Team üåô

Important announcement about Furry Moonfest 2026

Hello everyone,

We want to inform you that, due to circumstances beyond our control, we need to reschedule Moonfest.

The new dates are July 24-27, 2026, which is one week earlier than previously scheduled.

We understand this change may cause inconvenience and we sincerely apologize. At this moment we are working on updating all links and corresponding information. Thank you for your patience while we complete this process.

We greatly value your understanding and support. We remain committed to offering you the best possible experience, and we are confident these new dates will allow us to deliver the event we all expect.
If you have any questions, we are at your disposal.

Thank you for your understanding.

- Moonfest Team üåô

Chia and Moka have something incredible ready for you! We can now begin the first official step toward Moonfest, and we want to share it with all the excitement in the universe because this is already starting.

Hotel reservations are now available, and this week we will share the special links provided for that purpose. Only one person per group should make the reservation for everyone. And remember what the hotel emphasized: MAXIMUM FOUR PEOPLE PER ROOM, although there are also options for those who prefer to stay alone, as a couple, or in groups of three without any issue. Best of all, the charge is not made immediately. It is processed 48 hours before the event, so you can reserve calmly and keep saving.

After reserving, the group fills out a very simple form with the reservation number provided by the hotel. That step is completed only once per group and will help us organize everything.

Official Moonfest registration will arrive in 2026, and only those associated with a group with a valid reservation code will be able to register. Unlike the hotel, event registration is paid immediately at the time of signup.

For now, celebrate. We have begun. The Moonfest adventure is underway, and what is coming will be unforgettable. If you have questions, we are here with full energy and ready to help.

üåô‚ú®

I'll just say... this is a good time to stay tuned üëÄ

üåô

Sunfest is evolving, and this year it arrives with a new name: Moonfest.

After two editions under the sun, we are moving to the cold weather of Paipa. We are looking for a different, calm, and welcoming energy, with hot springs, mountains, and nights under the moon.

Registration is also changing and will now be in two stages:

1. Hotel reservation

Reservations will be made through official hotel links that will be provided soon.

If you are going in a group (maximum 4 per room) or as a couple, only one person reserves, and when registering for the convention, each person indicates which reservation they are under.

‚ùó Hotel reservation payment will not be charged until 48 hours before the event.

2. Convention registration

Registration will be through the Conspace platform at the beginning of 2026. Only those who already have a room will be able to register.

Includes:
‚Ä¢ Round-trip transportation from Bogota.
‚Ä¢ Access to common areas such as the heated pool and thermal-water jacuzzi.
‚Ä¢ Official event merch.

For more info, join the channel:
t.me/FurrySunfest

Furry Moonfest is coming!

This time we will meet at the Estelar Paipa Convention Center hotel between July 31 and August 3, 2026.

More news coming soon! üåô
